ProjectDescr.Title: Analysis of COVID-19 variants transcriptome and translatome data in human cell lines
ProjectDescr.Description: The project includes transcriptome data produced by infecting human cell lines with more than 10 types of COVID-19 variant, including the currently circulating Omicron BA.5 variant, as well as translatome data produced by infecting human cell lines with the S type and Omicron BA.1 variants. The aim is to identify key regulatory factors of variants through multi-omics integrated analysis of the produced transcriptome and translatome data.

Grant.Title: Development of integrated mechanistic preventive measures against potential COVID-19 variants of concern
